```{r, echo =FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(networkD3)


Pages <- data.frame(cbind(name = c("","","","",""),group = c(1,1,1,2,2), size = c(20,20,20,20,20)))
Links <-  data.frame(cbind(source = c(0,1,2,3),target = c(1,2,0,4), value = c(1,1,1,1)))


MyClickScript <- 'window.open("d.name");'

forceNetwork(
  Links = Links
  ,Nodes = Pages
  ,Source = "source"
  ,Target = "target"
  ,Value = "value"
  ,NodeID = "name"
  ,Group = "group"
  ,opacity = 0.8
  ,fontSize = 20
  ,charge = -100
#  ,clickAction = MyClickScript
  ,bounded = TRUE
  ,zoom = TRUE)


```
